      • getCreditCardType

        public CreditCardType getCreditCardType()
        This method access the type of credit card.
        Returns:
        the credit card type.

      • getCardHolder

        public java.lang.String getCardHolder()
        This method access the name of credit card.
        Returns:
        the credit card name.

      • getExpiryMonth

        public int getExpiryMonth()
        This method access the expiry month of credit card.
        Returns:
        the credit card expiry month.

      • getExpiryYear

        public int getExpiryYear()
        This method access the expiry year of credit card.
        Returns:
        the credit card expiry year.

      • setExpiryMonth

        public void setExpiryMonth(int expiryMonth)
        This method set the expiry month of credit card. The method check if the entry is a valid month number, otherwise it set to 0.
        Parameters:
        expiryMonth - the month to be set.

      • setExpiryYear

        public void setExpiryYear(int expiryYear)
        This method set the expiry year of credit card.
        Parameters:
        expiryYear - the year to be set.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        This method shows the list of each credit card stored. The method add an "0" before if the expiry month of a credit card is less than 10.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the list of credit card.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(CreditCard o)
        This method checks if two credit card object are equal.
        Returns:
        true if both object are equal, false otherwise.
